member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.Configuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the build configuration, such as Debug or Release.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.IsCi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Cake is running in a CI environment.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.Ci
member.summary: Gets the configuration for the CI settings.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.Directories
member.summary: Gets the configuration for the location of common directories used during a build.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.Version
member.summary: Gets the configuration for version-related information.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.DirectoryConfig.Working
member.summary: Gets or sets the working directory.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.DirectoryConfig.Artifacts
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory for storing build artifacts.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.DirectoryConfig.BinaryOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory for storing binary output from the build process.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.DirectoryConfig.TestOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory for storing test output from the build process.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.VersionConfig.BuildNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets an unique build number for the build execution.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.VersionConfig.Primary
member.summary:
Gets or sets the primary version number for the build. This is in a simple {Major}.{Minor}.{Patch} format without prerelease, build or other extra information.
The value can repeat across multiple builds and is not unique.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.VersionConfig.Full
member.summary:
Gets or sets the full semantic version of the build. This includes prerelease, build and other extra information.
The value will be unique for every new commit, but if multiple builds are run for the same commit, it will remain the same, so it cannot be considered a unique build value.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.VersionConfig.Build
member.summary:
Gets or sets an unique version number for the build.
The value is unique for every build, regardless of whether a new commit is made or the same commit is being rebuilt.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Core.BaseTaskAttribute.CiSystem
member.summary:
Gets or sets the name of the CI system in which this task can be executed (TFS, AppVeyor, etc.).
If not specified, this task will always be executed.

member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Core.ConfigAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as a configuration task.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Core.TaskAttribute.RequiresConfig
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run the config tasks before this task is run.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Core.TaskAttribute.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of this task.

member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Core.TaskPluginAttribute
member.summary: Registers a class in the assembly that has task plugins.
